features.title: Email Course Creation
features.description: Create and send email courses to your subscribers with ease.

features.title: Customizable Templates
features.description: Choose from a variety of customizable templates to create your email courses.

features.description: Set up automated emails to send to your subscribers at specific intervals.

features.description: Track the performance of your email courses with detailed analytics and reporting.
